synopsis.text: Suyi and Yi-gyeong, two ordinary 18-year-old girls living in a quaint Korean town, find themselves on an unexpected journey of self-discovery and love. As they navigate through the complexities of their budding relationship, they dream of a future together in the bustling city of Seoul post-graduation. Based on Eunyoung Choi's bestselling short story 'That Summer', this 61-minute animated film beautifully captures the delicate essence of first love and the gentle evolution of their feelings. However, as time passes, Yi-gyeong begins to notice subtle changes in her emotions towards Suyi, leading to personal growth and introspection for both young women. Embark on this heartfelt journey with Suyi and Yi-gyeong as they explore the intricacies of love, identity, and the transformative power of relationships.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
